A [[cpp/language/class template argument deduction|deduction guide]] is provided for {{tt|std::extents}} to allow deduction from integral arguments.

The deduced type is equivalent to {{rrev multi|until1=c++26
|rev1={{c|std::dextents&lt;std::size_t, sizeof...(Integrals)&gt;}}
|rev2={{box|{{c/core|std::extents&lt;std::size_t,}}{{nbspt|1}}{{lti|cpp/header/span#Synopsis|maybe-static-ext}}{{sep}}{{c/core|&lt;Integrals&gt;...&gt;}}}}
}}

{{cpp/enable if|{{c|(std::is_convertible_v&lt;Integrals, std::size_t&gt; &amp;&amp; ...)}} is {{c|true}}}}.
